attributes.action: Facebook being used in the media without permission
attributes.additional_details:
I request that the media should seek approval for any extracts to be published from people's Facebook pages; especially in the event of death- approval from next of kin should be sought.
It is disrespectful for the media to assume they can extract grieving messages.
The media should be controlled in what they deem to be ‘of public interest’ where people have the right to express their feelings to others.
